title: album cover/vinyl toy font
content:
Can anyone ID this? I really like the way the tittles look.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090719133412im_/http:/typophile.com/files/trio_5803.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090719133412im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SD_Comicon_2009_Banner_thumb_6411.jpg)
author: sirladytron

comments.content: While I can’t help with the type id, I must note that I love how you can expect people here to know what a tittle is.

Freefont [Mutlu Ornamental](http://web.archive.org/web/20090719133412/http:/www.abstractfonts.com/font/11491).

Quote: »A fancy variation on the Caslon No540 Swash D Italic«
